name: car-fuel-and-emissions
title: Car fuel consumptions and emissions 2000-2013
description: Cleaned-up and consolidated car fuel consumptions and emissions data published by the Vehicle Certification Agency (VCA) for years 2000 to 2013. The VCA is an Executive Agency of the United Kingdom Department for Transport. Please check the booklet for more details  http://carfueldata.direct.gov.uk/additional/aug2013/VCA-Booklet-text-Aug-2013.pdf

fields.name: file
fields.label: File
fields.description: Original CSV file from where this record was extracted.

fields.name: year
fields.label: Year
fields.description: Year for the original record.

fields.name: manufacturer
fields.label: Manufacturer
fields.description: Car manufacturer or importer.

fields.name: model
fields.label: Model
fields.description: Car model.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Further details on the car model.

fields.name: euro_standard
fields.label: Euro Standard
fields.description: Euro Standard to which the record applies. Note that old standards where previously numbered in roman numerals (eg II, IV, etc). See http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/European_emission_standards for more details.

fields.name: tax_band
fields.label: Tax band
fields.description: Tax band for this car model in the UK. See https://www.gov.uk/vehicle-tax-rate-tables.

fields.name: transmission
fields.label: Transmission
fields.description: Transmission details. Note that this field has not been normalized, eg both '5AT' and 'A5' may indicate an Automatic 5 speed car.

fields.name: transmission_type
fields.label: Transmission type
fields.description: Transmission type. Either Automatic or Manual.

fields.name: engine_capacity
fields.label: Engine capacity
fields.description: Engine capacity in cubic centimetres (cc). To obtain the more common figure in liters, divide by 100 and round to one decimal, eg 1368 cc -> 1.4 L

fields.name: fuel_type
fields.label: Fuel type
fields.description: Fuel type this car uses, eg Diesel, Petrol, Electric, Hybrid, etc.

fields.name: urban_metric
fields.label: Urban (metric)
fields.description: Fuel comsumption in urban conditions in liters per 100 Kilometers (l/100 Km).

fields.name: extra_urban_metric
fields.label: Extra-urban (metric)
fields.description: Fuel comsumption in extra-urban conditions in liters per 100 Kilometers (l/100 Km).

fields.name: combined_metric
fields.label: Combined (metric)
fields.description: Combined fuel comsumption: average of the urban and extra-urban tests, weighted by the distances covered in each part, in liters per 100 Kilometers (l/100 Km).

fields.name: urban_imperial
fields.label: Urban (imperial)
fields.description: Fuel comsumption in urban conditions in miles per gallon (mpg).

fields.name: extra_urban_imperial
fields.label: Extra-urban (imperial)
fields.description: Fuel comsumption in extra-urban conditions in miles per gallon (mpg).

fields.name: combined_imperial
fields.label: Combined (imperial)
fields.description: Combined fuel comsumption: average of the urban and extra-urban tests, weighted by the distances covered in each part, in miles per gallon (mpg).

fields.name: noise_level
fields.label: noise_level
fields.description: External noise emitted by a car shown in decibels as measured on the A scale of a noise meter (dB (A)). See the guide referred in the dataset description for more details.

fields.name: co2
fields.label: CO2 emissions
fields.description: CO2 emissions in grammes per kilometre (g/km).

fields.name: thc_emissions
fields.label: thc_emissions
fields.description: Hydrocarbon emissions in milligrammes per kilometre (mg/km).

fields.name: co_emissions
fields.label: co_emissions
fields.description: Carbon monoxide emissions in milligrammes per kilometre (mg/km).

fields.name: nox_emissions
fields.label: nox_emissions
fields.description: Nitrogen oxides emissions in milligrammes per kilometre (mg/km).

fields.name: thc_nox_emissions
fields.label: thc_nox_emissions
fields.description: Hydrocarbon and Nitrogen oxides emissions in milligrammes per kilometre (mg/km).

fields.name: particulates
fields.label: particulates
fields.description: Particulates emissions in milligrammes per kilometre (mg/km).

fields.name: fuel_cost_6000_miles
fields.label: fuel_cost_6000_miles
fields.description: Fuel cost to run 6000 miles in pounds sterling (see booklet for details)

fields.name: fuel_cost_12000_miles
fields.label: fuel_cost_12000_miles
fields.description: Fuel cost to run 12000 miles in pounds sterling (see booklet for details)

fields.name: date_of_change
fields.label: date_of_change
fields.description: Date of change
